props.title: Simple, transparent pricing
props.subtitle: Get started with our product today
props.description: Everything you need to get started

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Simply sign up for an account and you'll have instant access to all features. Our onboarding process will guide you through the setup.

faqs.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and offer invoicing for enterprise customers.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and follow industry best practices to ensure your data is always protected.

props.heading: Ready to get started?
props.subheading: Join thousands of satisfied customers using our product every day.
